sense.def:
A collection of things
je skupina podobnih ali povezanih stvari.

seg.quote: Davis had a large collection of pop records.
...a collection of Scott Fitzgerald's short stories.

sense.def:
Collection
je postopek, pri katerem nekaj zberemo z več krajev ali od več ljudi.

seg.quote: Your curtains are ready for collection.

sense.def:
A collection
je tudi organizirano zbiranje denarja za dobrodelne namene ali zbrani znesek.

seg.quote: They organized dances and collections which raised £450.
